00007 template <typename GFS, class Iterator, typename U>
00008 Dune::FieldVector<double,2> gradient(const GFS& gfs, const Iterator& it, const U& u)
00009 {
00010   //const int dim = gfs.gridview().dimension;
00011   //const int dimw = gfs.gridview().dimensionworld;
00012   const int dim = 2;
00013   const int dimw = 2;
00014   
00015   typedef typename GFS::LocalFunctionSpace LFSU;
00016   typedef typename LFSU::Traits::FiniteElementType::
00017           Traits::LocalBasisType::Traits::RangeFieldType RF;
00018   typedef typename LFSU::Traits::FiniteElementType::
00019         Traits::LocalBasisType::Traits::JacobianType JacobianType;
00020   typedef typename LFSU::Traits::FiniteElementType::
00021           Traits::LocalBasisType::Traits::DomainFieldType DF;
00022   typedef typename LFSU::Traits::SizeType size_type;
00023   
00024   // get local function space
00025   LFSU lfsu(gfs);
00026   lfsu.setup(gfs);
00027 
00028   // Bind Local Function Space to this element
00029   lfsu.bind(*it);
00030 
00031   // Vector container for storing the coefficients on the actual element (same as U...)
00032   typename GFS::template VectorContainer<Real>::Type x_s(gfs,0.0);
00033   // get coefficients of this element
00034   lfsu.vread(u,x_s);
00035 
00036   // evaluate gradient of basis functions on reference element
00037   std::vector<JacobianType> js(lfsu.size());
00038   lfsu.finiteElement().localBasis().evaluateJacobian(it->geometry().center(),js);
00039 
00040   // transform gradients from reference element to real element
00041   const Dune::FieldMatrix<DF,dimw,dim>
00042           jac = it->geometry().jacobianInverseTransposed(it->geometry().center());
00043   std::vector<Dune::FieldVector<RF,dim> > gradphi(lfsu.size());
00044   for (size_type i=0; i<lfsu.size(); i++)
00045     jac.mv(js[i][0],gradphi[i]);
00046 
00047   // compute gradient of u
00048   Dune::FieldVector<RF,dim> gradu(0.0);
00049   for (size_type i=0; i<lfsu.size(); i++)
00050     gradu.axpy(x_s[i],gradphi[i]);
00051 
00052   return gradu;
00053 }
